Text:
*Update*
After further inspection i did realize the episode in Season 1 "Dudley Meets Mr.Can" is mislabeled and is actually the lion episode, I cant seem to find a substitute file for it so we'll have to do without for now.

I managed to finish the last 4 seasons faster than I anticipated, so I've gone ahead and uploaded all 5 into one, you can find it here http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7576945/The_Adventures_of_Dudley_the_Dragon

I'll no longer be seeding this particular torrent to get the other one going.
